Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: This occurs when one of the services has exited unexpectedly. Try a 'docker ps -a' to verify that one of the services has exited. Check the log and see the isse which is causing this. I suspect it is an orderer failure due to misconfig.

Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: This should now be resolved as of https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/7085/
